It's a bit short, but it's a must play for every HL2-fans out there. The story is set right after the ending of HL2, and it gives you a good picture of the aftermath. I like that the gravity gun is more important this time around. It's been used more to solve puzzles and fighting enemies than before. Gameplaywise it's more the same as HL2, which is a good thing.

Note: 17/20
Appréciation: Une "pseudo" extension qui saura ravir les fans de la franchise HALF-LIFE. Si ce n'est un peu court, le jeu est tout bonnement excellent.

Half life 2 oyununda kaldığımız yerden devam ediyoruz. Güzel. Ama ben yanına nargile delisi adlı kanalın nargile tütünü tadım testleri videoları açıkken oynamaktan daha çok zevk alıyorum. Ayrıca beynimi çift yönde geliştirmemi sağlıyor. Mesela hem ballı markasının mai tai tütününün tadının güzel olduğunu ve içinde marakaj mango ve şeftali olduğunu ayrıca da oyunun hikayesini öğrendim.

j'ai terminé half-life 2 et half-life 2 :episode one c'est sa suite.
cette suite est moins bien que half-life 2 mais il faut dire qu'il est un peu plus beau graphiquement mais cela reste les mêmes ennemies et cela doit être surtout que le jeu est court et montre peu nouveauté mais il faut dire que c'est la suite de half-life 2 en épisode donc il ne faut pas s'attendre à une grande quantité d'éléments nouveaux et il aura un épisode 2 ( mais jamais d'épisode 3 ).

il est court mais on peut l'obtenir pour presque rien, j'ai acheté à l'époque toute l'intégralité d'half-life pour quelques euros.
de plus, si on aime half-life 2, je peux vous assurez que vous aimerez cette nouveau épisode qui est fun,[spoiler] même si cet épisode ne concerne que la fuite de la citée 17 [/spoiler]
je vous le conseil, car même si c'est un vieux jeu je l'ai bien aimé.

The ending is a bit harsh, and it's way too short, but it's still on the quality of Half-Life 2. A must-buy for anyone wanting to continue the story-line, and not one you can skip, like Blue Shift or Opposing Force.
Kinda short, little annoying. Good gameplay except for the dogshit bit at the end with the train.
Decente, no tan bueno como el episodio 2 o el half life 2 original. Recomiendo jugarlo para seguir la historia y para pasar el rato.
Pretty short, but still an amazing addition to the story.

Not as good as Half Life 2, of course; it didn't really add anything new to the game that we hadn't seen in previous titles.

Still really good though, definitely a nice addition to the story. Play it for the plot, not the gameplay.
noice ;)
En sevdiğim half life episodudur kendisi. Düz Half life'ı bitirdiyseniz sıra bunlarda.
Episode 1 is fun, but it's not as fun as Episode 2. Play it, or else you wont understand Episode 2.
it really just makes you [b]FEEL[/b] like gordon freeman.

It's more Half-Life 2. It's not very complicated.

Seriously that's pretty much it, I don't really know what else to say. Quality doesn't dip a bit. Looks a bit better than the base game. Of both the episodes and the original game, I would probably say this is my least favorite, but that hardly means a thing. It's still on par with the rest. Really short, but that's just because of the episodic format. Alyx has much more of a presence in this game, and is your follower for just about the entire duration.

I really don't have anything else to say. If you liked Half-Life 2, I'm honestly not sure why you're not already playing this.

4/5
bien
Epicly
Short but fun and it is HalfLife, so do not need to say more.

This game is a ton of fun. It's a departure from previous half-life games in that instead of going through a full story and trying to reinvent the same formula and set of mechanics, it tries several interesting concepts that wouldn't work on a larger scale, making for a game that's short but super original.
Классное продолжение
Not as good as the base game or episode 2, but still fun and worth a play. Plus, episode 2 is based on it so for story so just play it.
A fun expansion to Half-Life 2. I enjoy being accompanied by Alyx, especially attempting to do the One Free Bullet achievement. Fun story, and a worthy expansion.
